title: Lisa Vanderpump’s Life After RHOBH is Full of Class Action Lawsuits
description:
Lisa Vanderpump is arguably one of the most famous and successful of Bravo’s Real Housewives (even if she’s no longer a Housewife). But, what’s a little success without a few lawsuits? After years of owning multiple businesses, including 30+ restaurants and starting a non-profit dog rescue, Lisa is finding herself at the center of several class action lawsuits brought against her by former employees alleging various violations of California labor law, along with a lawsuit against her dog rescue center. Tune in as we break it all down!  

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/legallyjudgy
